org.openhubframework.openhub.api.route

Class AbstractBasicRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.camel.builder.BuilderSupport
      • org.apache.camel.builder.RouteBuilder
        • org.apache.camel.spring.SpringRouteBuilder
          • org.openhubframework.openhub.api.route.AbstractBasicRoute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoutesBuilder, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, ApplicationContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractExtRoute, AsyncHelloRoute, AsynchInMessageRoute, AsynchMessageRoute, ContextCallRoute, DirectCallWsRoute, ExceptionTranslationRoute, PingRoute, SyncHelloRoute, VersionRoute

    public abstract class AbstractBasicRoute
extends SpringRouteBuilder
    Parent route definition that defines common route rules, e.g. exception policy, error handling etc.
    Author:
    Petr Juza

      • doErrorHandling

        protected void doErrorHandling()
                        throws Exception
        Defines global (better to say semi-global because it's scoped for one route builder) exception policy and common error handling.

        Default implementation catches common Exception and if it's synchronous message (see AsynchConstants.ASYNCH_MSG_HEADER) then redirect to AsynchConstants.URI_EX_TRANSLATION. If it's asynchronous message then determines according to exception's type if redirect to AsynchConstants.URI_ERROR_FATAL or AsynchConstants.URI_ERROR_HANDLING route URI.

        Throws:
        Exception - can be thrown during configuration

      • printMessageHistory

        @Handler
public void printMessageHistory(Exchange exchange)

public boolean isAsynch(@Header(value="asynchMsgProcessing")

      • exceptionHandling

        @Handler
public String exceptionHandling(Exception ex,
                                         @Header(value="asynchMsgProcessing")
                                         Boolean asynch)
        Handles specified exception.
        Parameters:
        ex - the thrown exception
        asynch - true if it's asynchronous message processing otherwise synchronous processing
        Returns:
        next route URI

      • getOutWsUri

        protected String getOutWsUri(String connectionUri,
                             String messageSenderRef,
                             String soapAction)
        Constructs a "to" URI for sending WS messages to external systems, i.e., Camel Web Service Endpoint URI for contacting an external system via SOAP 1.1.
        Parameters:
        connectionUri - the URI to connect to the external system, e.g.: http://localhost:8080/vfmock/ws/mm7
        messageSenderRef - the message sender ref (bean id/name in Spring context)
        soapAction - the SOAP action to be invoked, can be null for implicit handling of SOAP messages by the external system
        Returns:
        the Camel Endpoint URI for producing (sending via To) SOAP messages to external system

      • getOutWsUri

        protected String getOutWsUri(String connectionUri,
                             String messageSenderRef)
        Shorthand for getOutWsUri(String, String, String).
        Parameters:
        connectionUri - the URI connection
        messageSenderRef - the reference of message sender
        Returns:
        URI of WS compliant with SOAP 1.1 version

      • getOutWsSoap12Uri

        protected String getOutWsSoap12Uri(String connectionUri,
                                   String messageSenderRef)
        Shorthand for getOutWsSoap12Uri(String, String, String).
        Parameters:
        connectionUri - the URI connection
        messageSenderRef - the reference of message sender
        Returns:
        URI of WS compliant with SOAP 1.2 version

      • getOutWsSoap12Uri

        protected String getOutWsSoap12Uri(String connectionUri,
                                   String messageSenderRef,
                                   String soapAction)
        Constructs a "to" URI for sending WS messages to external systems, i.e., Camel Web Service Endpoint URI for contacting an external system via SOAP 1.2.
        Parameters:
        connectionUri - the URI to connect to the external system, e.g.: http://localhost:8080/vfmock/ws/mm7
        messageSenderRef - the message sender ref (bean id/name in Spring context)
        soapAction - the SOAP action to be invoked, can be null for implicit handling of SOAP messages by the external system
        Returns:
        the Camel Endpoint URI for producing (sending via To) SOAP messages to external system

      • getInWsUri

        protected String getInWsUri(QName qName)
        Gets "from" URI for handling incoming WS messages with default '' bean.
        Parameters:
        qName - the operation QName (namespace + local part)
        Returns:
        from URI

      • getInWsUri

                            @Nullable
                            String params)
        Gets "from" URI for handling incoming WS messages with default '' bean.
        Parameters:
        qName - the operation QName (namespace + local part)
        params - the endpoint URI parameters (without leading signs ? or &)
        Returns:
        from URI

      • addEventNotifier

        protected final void addEventNotifier(EventNotifier eventNotifier)
        Adds new event notifier.

        Use manual adding via this method or use EventNotifier annotation for automatic registration. Don't use both.

        Parameters:
        eventNotifier - the event notifier

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns class name of the route implementation class.

        This is because of using bean(this, "createResponseForGetCounterData") - if there is no toString() method then StackOverflowError is thrown.

        Overrides:
        toString in class RouteBuilder
        Returns:
        class name
